```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(reticulate)

plot(iris)
```
```{r}
summary(iris)
```



```{r}
scatter <- ggplot(data=iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width)) 
scatter + geom_point(aes(color=Species, shape=Species)) +
  xlab("Sepal Length") +  ylab("Sepal Width") +
  ggtitle("Sepal Length-Width")

```
